children.name: search  the user and verify the message record found
search  the user and verify the message record found
Given I am on home page
When I enter the Username
And I enter the password
And I click on the Login Button
And I click on the Admin tab
And I should see System Users Text
And I enter the Username "Admin"
And I select the user role "Admin"
And I enter Employee name "Paul Collings"
And I select status "Enable"
And I click on the Search Button
Then I should see the message (1) Record Found

children.name: search  the user and verify the message record found
Given I am on home page
When I enter the Username
And I enter the password
And I click on the Login Button
And I click on the Admin tab
And I should see System Users Text
And I enter the Username "Nina.Patel"
And I select the user role "ESS"
And I enter Employee name "Nina Patel"
And I select status "Enable"
And I click on the Search Button
Then I should see the message (1) Record Found

children.name: search  the user and verify the message record found
Given I am on home page
When I enter the Username
And I enter the password
And I click on the Login Button
And I click on the Admin tab
And I should see System Users Text
And I enter the Username "Odis.Adalwi"
And I select the user role "Admin"
And I enter Employee name "Odis Adalwin"
And I select status "Enable"
And I click on the Search Button
Then I should see the message (1) Record Found
